title: Crash after champ select
body:
My game just gives a bugsplat after champ slect everytime and i can not get into any game at all, i have tried to fix this for 2 weeks and now im tsarting to get really annoyed.

I have changed logitech files, reinstalled drivers, updated windows 10 fully, disabled xbox game bar, repaired league, completely re-installed league and much more and im really running out of options and its so damn frustrating.

Please help if you know what to do!

Thank you :)

replies.body: I have the same problem too. My drivers are from AMD and i tried all the tips and nothing worked. I deinstalled LoL 4 times and it still crashes.
I'm having the exact same issue. Also, every time i get in game, as soon as the champions spawn, the game crashes.

It looks like you've tried some of the best starting steps in resolving bug splats. Most of the time, bugsplats are the result of driver or hardware issues. Since the issue is persisting, I recommend working through the steps you haven't already done inside of our [Bugsplat & Crash guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if those steps yield any change.
I'm having the exact same issue, and I've tried all the "fix tips" to no avail. About to just throw in the towel.
